alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Chester; Decatur; Henderson; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 4:25PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Henderson, Benton, southeastern Carroll, east central Madison, northeastern Chester and Decatur Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 424 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Camden to near Wildersville to near Blue Goose. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Camden, Natchez Trace State Park, Natchez Trace State Forest, Parsons, Bruceton, Decaturville, Reagan, Blue Goose, Mifflin, Bargerton, Wildersville, Jacks Creek, Parkers Crossroads, Darden, Scotts Hill, Dollar, Rock Hill, Holladay and Middle Fork. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Carroll; Chester; Decatur; Henderson; Madison
